jobDescription: We are currently looking for an Assistant Research Scientist I to join our R&D; Team. The Nematology Assistant Research Scientist is a critical position that offers the opportunity to significantly impact the Company with development and improvement of key bioassays and support of the development...BS degree with 3 + years of experience. Previous experiences of bioassays and nematicide testing in the area of plant nematology are desired.  Innovative, self-starter, good communicator & listener, collaborator, goal oriented, empathetic is desired, as well as, having excellent analytical, organizational, coordination and multi-tasking skills.  The salary range is competitive. MBI offers a comprehensive benefits package including stock options, a 401(k) plan with employer match, and a health plan including medical and dental coverage, life insurance coverage, long term disability, and a flexible spending account for dependent care and/or medical expenses. In addition, this position is eligible for an annual bonus plan.  The above is a list of essential duties and responsibilities for this position. This list is not all-inclusive. This job description may be modified as needed.  MBI is an equal-opportunity employer. A pre-employment drug screen and background check will be required.SDL2017
